member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE
member.summary: Specifies motion estimation precision modes for video encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE_MAXIMUM
member.summary: No limit in the precision for motion estimation vectors. This mode allows the maximum precision supported by the driver.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE_FULL_PIXEL
member.summary: The precision for motion estimation vectors has to be at most full pixel.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE_HALF_PIXEL
member.summary: The precision for motion estimation vectors has to be at most half pixel.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_MOTION_ESTIMATION_PRECISION_MODE_QUARTER_PIXEL
member.summary: The precision for motion estimation vectors has to be at most quarter pixel.
